message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I think 60/40 is a good place to begin.
Your offer was quite generous Alice, but I'm sure you understand that this money will be much more valuable to me than it will be to you after a few more rounds. How about we try a 70/30 split?
Let's be reasonable, Bob. Inflation is hurting us both. A 50/50 split seems like the fairest option at this point.
